heading: HB02610
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE COCONUT FARMERS AND INDUSTRY DEVELOPMENT TRUST FUNDS AND PROVIDING FOR ITS MANAGEMENT AND UTILIZATION, PRIORITIZING BUT NOT LIMITED TO COCONUT FARMERS COOPERATIVE ORGANIZATION
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02610
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE COCONUT FARMERS AND INDUSTRY DEVELOPMENT TRUST FUNDS AND PROVIDING FOR ITS MANAGEMENT AND UTILIZATION, PRIORITIZING BUT NOT LIMITED TO COCONUT FARMERS COOPERATIVE ORGANIZATION
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : JALOSJOS, ROMEO JR. M.
DATE FILED : 2019-07-24
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Savellano (000 2019-10-07)2. Madrona (000 2019-12-02)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-09-23
          -The Committee created a Technical Working Group (TWG), to be chaired by Rep. Sharon S. Garin, to further study the measures.
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2019-11-04
          -The Secretariat was directed to prepare the proposed substitute bill to be presented to the mother committee.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2019-07-31
